news.title: How To Bridge Your Assets Using Connext's Bridge Protocol
news.subtitle: Learn how to transfer your assets with a secure bridging protocol

childMarkdownRemark.html:
As we learned earlier, blockchain bridges are necessary to facilitate communication and movement of assets between one network and another. This technology streamlines cross chain activity from L1 ‚Üí L2, L2 ‚Üí L2, L2 ‚Üí L1, and even L1 ‚Üí L1. In today‚Äôs tutorial, we take a look at trustless interoperability protocol Connext, which facilitates bridging and cross chain dApp deployment.

Why Connext?

Connext enables fast, non-custodial communication between chains and rollups. Their bridge protocol currently supports the transfer of funds between 17 networks. Unlike most other interoperability systems, Connext enables this without introducing any new trust assumptions or external validators, making the system more secure than architectures that use external validators. 

They also suggest that ‚Äúbridging is just the beginning of the story‚Äù in the next paradigm shift of Web3 interoperability, prompting them to launch an extensive toolkit not merely limited to bridges, but also cross chain dApp implementation. Builders can execute instructions from one central xApp (pronounced zap)‚Äîa decentralized app that performs operations between independent chains‚Äîinstead of deploying on multiple chains.

For the purposes of this post, we‚Äôll dive into the bridging component of their tech stack.

Sending Assets Using Connext

Ready to bridge your assets over? Head over to Connext‚Äôs bridging portal here.

Make sure to have your MetaMask wallet with the assets you‚Äôd like to transfer. And remember, you can always fund your wallet directly within MetaMask by hitting the blue ‚ÄúBUY‚Äù button in your home screen.

Download MetaMask

Connect your wallet in the top right corner and select MetaMask. Once connected, you can choose what network you want to bridge TO and FROM in the dropdown menu.

In this example, I bridge ETH from Ethereum Mainnet to Optimism.

After selecting your network and token you want to bridge, input the token amount in the box and select ‚ÄòSwap‚Äô.

Review the amount and fees and select ‚ÄòConfirm Swap‚Äô on the box that pops up, then approve the transaction in your MetaMask wallet. Note: if you‚Äôre using a hardware wallet like I am, you will need to confirm the transaction in your hardware device after approving it in MetaMask.

A progress window will appear and prompt you to ‚ÄòSign to Claim Funds‚Äô. Click that and confirm in your MetaMask (and hardware wallet if using). 

The claim should be instantly successful and you will notice the network you bridged to funded with your tokens. This was a swift process and I was done transferring my ETH in under 5 minutes.

You can bridge from any of the 17 networks‚Äîyou could bridge from Optimism to Arbitrum or Ethereum Mainnet, and even to alt L1 chains like BNB Chain‚Äîusing Connext to transfer your assets takes a few minutes on any provided route.

How It Works

Connext‚Äôs infrastructure makes cross chain activity possible, whether it‚Äôs through bridging funds or enabling cross chain applications, referred to as xApps. 

Connext‚Äôs Amarok protocol upgrade works quite similar to Hop‚Äîthere are Routers that forward tokens to the user on the destination chain then claim their funds back from a liquidity pool when eventually a slower batched transfer arrives on the destination chain. 

In Amarok Connext partners with Nomad‚Äîan optimistic cross-chain communication protocol.

The Amarok protocol defines four core actors‚Äî(1) the user, (2) the Connext Router, (3) the Nomad Updater, and (4) the Nomad Watcher. 

More actors are involved, though we can leave them aside for now. 

Let‚Äôs take a look at the simplified process flow and how these actors work together:

  1. The user (let‚Äôs call her Alice) sends a transaction to the Connext Smart Contract on the source chain signalling the Connext Routers that she wants to bridge.
  2. A Connext Router‚Äîthere are several‚Äîwill see Alice‚Äôs transaction including the instructions. The Router will send the intended amount to Alice on the destination chain minus a fee. Now Alice is fine, but how does the Router get the money back?
  3. Under the hood and on the source chain, the Connext Smart Contract will forward Alice‚Äôs funds to the Nomad Smart Contract. The Nomad Smart Contract batches several transactions together into an update in the form of a merkle tree and the root of the tree is signed by the Nomad Updater.
  4. When signed, the update is being sent to the destination chain to another Nomad Smart Contract. Now, the Nomad Watcher has 30 minutes to step in if the update is fraudulent. The watcher can compare the state at home and the signed state and will detect fraud. 
  5. If nothing is fraudulent, then the Connext Router can claim its tokens back on the destination chain using the proof that it has already sent tokens to Alice in Step 2.

Connext Routers need to stake tokens ($NEXT) in order to participate in the network and earn a proportional share of work from the network in return. 

‚ÄúNEXT keeps the network running by ensuring that all routers are beholden to the same set of rules around fair transaction ordering, and a router‚Äôs NEXT is slashed if they violate these rules.‚Äù ‚Äì What‚Äôs $NEXT?

Final Thoughts

Connext‚Äôs extensive list of networks is likely to keep growing and they allow you to bridge cheaply and rapidly without introducing any new trust assumptions. If you‚Äôre looking for a secure, trustless protocol to transfer your assets, consider Connext your next (ü•Å) protocol to try out. 

Here‚Äôs a recap: 

  1. Go to bridge.connext.network
  2. Connect your MetaMask wallet 
  3. Select the network you want to transfer TO and FROM
  4. Select the asset you want to transfer 
  5. Click ‚ÄúSwap‚Äù and ‚ÄúConfirm Swap‚Äù and sign the transactions in MetaMask (and hardware wallet if using) to start the transfer
  6. Click ‚ÄúSign to Claim Funds‚Äù and voila!

While a lot of bridges have popped up in the space, the ones that have a heavy emphasis on security will prevail. 

Enjoy connecting your way around Web3!

nodes.title: Simplifying crypto transactions with Banxa
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More with MetaMask Partner Series Banxa
image.description: More with MetaMask Partner Series Banxa

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. Our More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across the ecosystem. Next up, Banxa.

Navigating crypto used to be a complicated process, but no longer. At Banxa, our mission is to simplify crypto onboarding. As a leading crypto on-ramp and off-ramp solution integrated with MetaMask, we exchange your fiat money for cryptocurrency and vice versa.

Without Banxa, crypto wallets like MetaMask would need numerous integrations, partnerships, and licenses to help their users buy and sell crypto. This process is time-consuming, resource intensive, and involves additional risks and regulatory responsibilities. Banxa handles all of these logistics, so MetaMask can focus on what matters ‚Äì building web3 products that users love.

Configurable crypto journeys

Tailored experiences: MetaMask‚Äôs configurability ensures the best experience for every customer, whether you are a new or returning user.

Streamlined onboarding: For new users, Banxa minimizes the steps needed to buy and sell crypto.

Effortless transactions: Returning users can complete purchases in just one click without leaving MetaMask app, thanks to prior verification.

Worldwide user reach

MetaMask's commitment to accessibility works in tandem with Banxa's vision of global web3 onboarding. Leveraging MetaMask's user-friendly interface and extensive features, Banxa reaches a wider audience, providing an easy gateway to the world of cryptocurrencies. MetaMask‚Äôs configurability also improves our ability to deliver superior experiences to Banxa users.

Powerful web3 APIs

MetaMask provides a robust suite of web3 APIs that serve as a gold standard for product integration. These APIs offer a seamless and standardized approach for Banxa to connect its services with MetaMask, enabling smooth user experiences and efficient transactions.

By integrating Banxa's smooth on-ramp and off-ramp solutions with MetaMask, we've made it easier than ever for users to navigate the decentralized web. The complexity of crypto is no longer a barrier to entry.

Experience the ease of buying crypto with MetaMask via Banxa today.

Looking for more help? We got you. Learn how to buy crypto on MetaMask.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how Banxa simplifies crypto transactions with MetaMask integration. Enjoy effortless onboarding, tailored experiences, and powerful web3 APIs.

nodes.title: MetaMask feature update: MetaMask Staking in mobile app
nodes.subtitle: Stake ETH from your phone ‚Äî wherever and whenever.

image.title: Staking now available in MetaMask mobile app
image.description: Stake ETH directly in MetaMask mobile app

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Staking is now available inside MetaMask App, making it easier than ever to stake crypto with us. You can now stake ETH, view your staked ETH position, and unstake directly from MetaMask App. (Note: this feature is unavailable for UK users, who will be redirected to MetaMask Portfolio interface.)

Our MetaMask Staking mobile update follows the launch of Pooled Staking earlier this year ‚Äî allowing users to stake any amount of ETH directly with MetaMask, and earn rewards. Additionally, US users will now be able to access MetaMask Pooled Staking in both MetaMask App and in MetaMask Portfolio.

Dive into MetaMask Staking on the MetaMask App now, available for iOS and Android. Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide to staking.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask App now supports staking ETH natively in mobile, making Pooled Staking, Liquid Staking, and Validator Staking easier than ever.

nodes.title: Web3 gaming enters its new era with HyperPlay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More Secure with MetaMask and HyperPlay
image.description: More Secure with MetaMask and HyperPlay image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. Our More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across the ecosystem.

HyperPlay was founded to build a secure, censorship-resistant, free-market gaming platform. We were, and still are, driven by offering greater flexibility and ownership than the web2 paradigm, while also providing a safer cross-platform experience. Thanks to our efforts, today we are entering a new era of gaming.

Replacing the old formula

While the web2 gaming world continues to cling to its old ways, HyperPlay‚Äôs web3-friendly game store allows players to carry their in-game assets across all games, offering them true ownership and autonomy, without fear of de-platforming. MetaMask wallet is a key integration, eliminating obstacles for gamers and developers alike.

HyperPlay‚Äôs game store brings token swaps, cross-chain bridging, and easy cash to crypto on-ramping into every game through our in-game overlay. This overlay is powered by MetaMask Portfolio, making it secure and easy for gamers to access all of these functions no matter what game they're playing. Wallet transactions take place without leaving a game ‚Äî reducing friction, improving safety, and preserving immersive experiences.

Players can use the same trusted wallet across multiple games and marketplaces instead of traipsing from one platform to the next with a handful of proprietary wallets. Gamers can play their entire existing games library in the HyperPlay app including from other stores like Epic Games and GOG, and combine this library with the games from HyperPlay‚Äôs own official store, all gathered in a single gaming hub.

Our new user experience

By eliminating the need to leave the game to manage assets, HyperPlay‚Äôs MetaMask overlay experience enhances gaming immersion ‚Äî assets can be managed without skipping a beat. Reducing friction in web3 gaming is crucial for encouraging adoption ‚Äî and bringing tokens and in-game collectibles closer to the action increases their utility. Assets that players own should be a joy to use rather than a burden. Streamlining and strengthening the transaction process doesn't just help players, it unlocks new opportunities for developers to innovate and better serve their audiences.

MetaMask Portfolio offers a secure, simple way to explore the web3 gaming universe, featuring HyperPlay's curated list of MetaMask-compatible games, which make it even easier to onboard new players to web3.

Securely powering gamers into the future

HyperPlay‚Äôs MetaMask integration also results in another essential benefit: a safer onboarding experience. The HyperPlay app allows for MetaMask transactions to be visible on-screen without the need to leave or even minimize the gaming experience, all while preserving the privacy of user keys. Secret recovery phrases are never exposed to games, and can even be kept off the gaming computer itself.

For an extra layer of protection, HyperPlay and MetaMask offer users an external signing feature powered by MetaMask Mobile, which keeps keys off the player‚Äôs device. With MetaMask Mobile, gamers can send transactions to an external mobile device, providing a secure connection method that acts as an additional barrier against any potential security compromise.

Combining the innovative tech of HyperPlay‚Äôs game store with the ironclad safety of MetaMask Portfolio‚Äôs in-game overlay is a powerful partnership. Gone are the days where gamers have to hop out of game screens at a critical moment to swap tokens, bridge networks, or buy crypto with fiat. The future of gaming is now.

Leave outdated gaming platforms behind and immerse yourself in web3 gaming by exploring HyperPlay today.

nodes.metaDescription: Find out how MetaMask and HyperPlay are ushering in a new era of web3 gaming that is secure and powerful.

sharedCopy.browserNotSupported: is not supported. Please download a browser that supports MetaMask.
